workflow.description: CHANGE LOG --------------------- 06/16/2021 > Update Level 1-Level 4 State to exclude record lock on Administrator, SafariCo Procurement Manager, and Next Approver. > Update Approved State to exclude record lock on Administrator.
workflow.name: ATS | PO Approval Workflow

initcondition.formula: "Approval Status" IN ("Approval Status1") AND "User Role" IN ("Role1")
"Next Approver" IN ("Current User") OR "User Role" IN ("Role1")

( "User Role" NOT IN ("Role1") AND "User" NOT IN ("P2P Approver File:Central Procurement Manager") AND "User" NOT IN ("P2P Approver File:CEO") AND "User" NOT IN ("P2P Approver File:CFO") AND "User" NOT IN ("P2P Approver File:Operations Director (BUCEO)") AND "User" NOT IN ("P2P Approver File:Finance Controller") AND "User" NOT IN ("Employee:Supervisor") ) OR "User" IN ("Employee")
"Next Approver" IN ("Current User") OR "User Role" IN ("Role1")

( "User Role" NOT IN ("Role1") AND "User" NOT IN ("P2P Approver File:CFO") AND "User" NOT IN ("P2P Approver File:Finance Controller") AND "User" NOT IN ("P2P Approver File:Operations Director (BUCEO)") AND "User" NOT IN ("P2P Approver File:CEO") ) OR "User" IN ("Employee")
"Next Approver" IN ("Current User") OR "User Role" IN ("Role1")

( "User Role" NOT IN ("Role1") AND "User" NOT IN ("P2P Approver File:CFO") AND "User" NOT IN ("P2P Approver File:Operations Director (BUCEO)") AND "User" NOT IN ("P2P Approver File:CEO") ) OR "User" IN ("Employee")
"Next Approver" IN ("Current User") OR "User Role" IN ("Role1")
( "User Role" NOT IN ("Role1") AND "User" NOT IN ("P2P Approver File:CFO") AND "User" NOT IN ("P2P Approver File:CEO") ) OR "User" IN ("Employee")
"Next Approver" IN ("Current User") OR "User Role" IN ("Role1")
( "User Role" NOT IN ("Role1") AND "User" NOT IN ("P2P Approver File:CEO") ) OR "User" IN ("Employee")
